BG.name: Horse Life 4
BG.description: Gallop towards brand new adventures in a beautiful vast open world that's begging to be discovered! Compete in tournaments and various missions to show off what a dream team you are. Create your own character and choose a loyal companion from 12 different breeds of horse. You can even customise their look with a variety of new outfits and accessories!

AU.name: Horse Life 4
AU.description: Gallop towards brand new adventures in a beautiful vast open world that's begging to be discovered! Compete in tournaments and various missions to show off what a dream team you are. Create your own character and choose a loyal companion from 12 different breeds of horse. You can even customise their look with a variety of new outfits and accessories!

AT.name: Horse Life 4 - Mein Pferd, mein Freund, mein Champion
AT.description: Galoppiere mit deinem treuen Pferd in neue, spannende Abenteuer! Erkunde eine riesige, offene Welt, finde neue Freunde, löse eine Vielzahl an Aufgaben und gewinne Turnier-Trophäen! Zeige allen, was für ein Dream-Team ihr seid! Erstelle deine eigene Heldin, wähle deinen vierbeinigen Freund aus 12 verschiedenen Pferderassen und rüste dich und dein Pferd mit tollen Accessoires aus!

BE.name: Horse Life 4
BE.description: Dans Horse Life 4, ton cheval et toi galopez vers de toutes nouvelles aventures dans un vaste monde ouvert qui n'attend plus que d'être visité ! Explore-le, fais-toi de nouveaux amis, entreprends des missions diverses et variées et gagne des trophées lors des tournois pour montrer que vous formez une véritable équipe de rêve ! Crée ta propre héroïne, choisis ton loyal compagnon parmi 12 races de chevaux différentes et personnalise leur apparence à l'aide de nouveaux accessoires et de tenues inédites !

ES.name: Horse Life 4
ES.description: En Horse Life 4, tu caballo y tú galoparéis hacia nuevas aventuras en un mundo abierto inmenso aún por descubrir. ¡Explora, haz amistades, cumple misiones, gana trofeos en torneos y muestra el buen equipo que formáis! ¡Crea a tu propia protagonista, elige a tu fiel acompañante entre 12 razas distintas de caballos y personaliza su apariencia con distintos atuendos y accesorios!

IT.name: Horse Life 4
IT.description: In Horse Life 4 tu e il tuo cavallo galopperete verso nuove avventure in un vasto mondo tutto da scoprire, pronto per essere esplorato! Conosci nuovi amici, affronta appassionanti missioni, vinci premi nei tornei e dimostra che tu e il tuo destriero siete una squadra fortissima! Crea la tua eroina, scegli il tuo fedele compagno tra 12 diverse razze di cavalli e personalizzali con una ricca varietà di nuovi outfit e accessori.

FI.name: Horse Life 4
FI.description: Gallop towards brand new adventures in a beautiful vast open world that's begging to be discovered! Compete in tournaments and various missions to show off what a dream team you are. PT.name: Horse Life 4
PT.description: Em Horse Life 4 tu e teu cavalo galopam na direção de novas aventuras num vasto mundo aberto, à espera para ser descoberto! Explora, faz novos amigos, embarca em diferentes missões e ganha troféus em torneios, e mostra a equipa de sonho que tu e teu cavalo são! Cria a tua própria heroína, escolhe o teu companheiro fiel dentre 12 raças de cavalos diferentes e customiza-os com uma variedade de novas roupas e acessórios!

SE.name: Horse Life 4
SE.description: Gallop towards brand new adventures in a beautiful vast open world that's begging to be discovered! Compete in tournaments and various missions to show off what a dream team you are. Create your own character and choose a loyal companion from 12 different breeds of horse. You can even customise their look with a variety of new outfits and accessories!

NL.name: Horse Life 4
NL.description: In Horse Life 4 galoppeer je samen met je paard door gloednieuwe avonturen in een enorme open wereld! Verken, maak nieuwe vrienden, ga op allerlei missies, win trofeeën in toernooien en laat zien wat voor een droomteam jullie zijn! Creëer je eigen heldin, kies je trouwe metgezel uit 12 verschillende paardenrassen en maak ze mooi met allerlei nieuwe outfits en accessoires!

MT.name: Horse Life 4
MT.description: Gallop towards brand new adventures in a beautiful vast open world that's begging to be discovered! Compete in tournaments and various missions to show off what a dream team you are. Create your own character and choose a loyal companion from 12 different breeds of horse. You can even customise their look with a variety of new outfits and accessories!

RU.name: Horse Life 4
RU.description: В игре Horse Life 4 вы и ваша лошадь галопом проноситесь сквозь новые репятствия в огромном неизведанном мире! Исследуйте, заводите друзей, выполняйте различные задания, выигрывайте трофеи в турнирах и докажите всем, что вы — команда мечты! Создайте собственную героиню, выберите преданного партнера из 12 пород лошадей и измените внешний вид при помощи разнообразных нарядов и украшений!
